segments.text: Well , Mr . Brooks . I ’ m sorry , again , for the delay , but we should have everything completed by the time you get back .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I certainly hope so . Can we arrange to meet on the 27th ? That should give you enough time .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , sir . That ’ s more than enough time . I do appreciate your understanding . Why don ’ t we say 10:00 o ’ clock on the 27th ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Fine , Mr . Tan . I ’ ll see you then .
segments.speaker: S2
